Text.Page:
The Blood Guard is Thulsa's most elite unit. They protect this place and so are a serious threat to the federation garrison. Worse, they seem to be up to something lately.

You can find Blood Guard {@LinkCreature:33#10#mages}, {@LinkCreature:33#60#sorcerers}, and {@LinkCreature:33#70#arcanists} near the Shrieking Catacombs and the Distortion Prison.

Bring back whatever information you can find.

What have you found? Hmm...we'll need to study this further, but it may answer our questions about how Thulsa's power is supporting the Blood Guard.

Before I get too far into these, here's your reward!
You can find Blood Guard {@LinkCreature:33#10#mages}, {@LinkCreature:33#60#sorcerers}, and {@LinkCreature:33#70#arcanists} near the Shrieking Catacombs and the Distortion Prison.
